DOC.detailed_description: There mount evidence show vitamin D deficiency may increase risk many common serious disease , include osteoporosis , cardiovascular disease , cancer type 1 diabetes ( Holick Chen , 2008 ) . Hypovitaminosis D prevalent UK general population . Due diet lifestyle change use sun block product people endogenously synthesise sufficient vitamin D sunlight exposure ( Hyppönen Power , 2007 ) . Therefore , vitamin D intake dietary source become important , however limited food naturally rich vitamin D. Some country ( e.g . USA , Canada ) fortify milk vitamin D result milk major contributor vitamin D intake . Vitamin D3 common form use fortification currently fortify food . However , evidence 25 ( OH ) D3 increase vitamin D status human effectively vitamin D3 ( Bischoff-Ferrari et al , 2012 ; Cashman et al , 2012 ) . To knowledge , human intervention study compare efficacy 25 ( OH ) D3 versus vitamin D3 increase vitamin D status , acute human study examine effect form vitamin D fortify dairy product vitamin D status human .
DOC.criteria: BMI : 2035 kg/m2 Glucose < 7 mmol/l ( diagnosed diabetes ) Total cholesterol < 7 mmol/l TAG < 4 mmol/l Serum 25 ( OH ) D3 ≤50 nmol/L Normal liver kidney function Haemoglobin : adult male > 125 g/L Milk allergy/intolerance lactose intolerance Cardiovascular , renal , gastrointestinal , respiratory , endocrine disease cancer Use nutritional supplement , particularly contain vitamin D Outdoor worker use tan bed Overseas holiday two month study period
